testimonials.title: What I Can Offer
testimonials.intro: I offer tailored solutions to meet the technological needs of businesses and individuals, including:

services.webDev: Web Development: I create modern, responsive and optimized web sites and applications for every device.
services.database: Database Management: I design, optimize and manage MySQL databases for high performance and security.
services.api: API Integration: I implement system integrations to improve efficiency and automation.
services.maintenance: Maintenance and Updates: I provide continuous support for updates, bug fixes and improvements.
services.custom: Custom Solutions: I develop custom software using technologies like Java, Spring Boot, PHP and JavaScript.
services.consulting: Technology Consulting: Guidance in choosing the best technologies and digital strategies for your projects.

testimonials.conclusion: Each service is designed to deliver quality, reliability and concrete results.
